OpenSim::AbstractActuator

AbstractActuator Class Reference

#include <AbstractActuator.h>

Inheritance diagram for AbstractActuator:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

An abstract class for representing an actuator (e.g., a torque motor, muscle, .

..).

Author:
Frank C. Anderson
Version:
1.0
